abstract.text: Inquires about a particular characteristic of a credential.

inlineContent.text: A pointer to the secondary status result that provides additional information in case of failure.
The object identifier of the characteristic of the credential to return.
A pointer the function uses to return a set of buffers that contain the results across all of the credential’s mechanisms. If the desired object is not found, this is set to
to free the memory of this object when you are done with it.
for a description of other status outputs.

abstract.text: Returns the remaining time in seconds before the credential expires.
The GSS buffer set object has no value.
Evaluate return values that most GSS-API functions use to indicate the outcome of an operation.
A pointer to the OID descriptor that exchanges object identifiers with many GSS-API functions.
A pointer to the descriptor that you use to manage an array of buffer descriptors.
A pointer to an opaque type that you use to exchange a credential object with GSS-API functions.
Obtains per-mechanism information about a credential.
Inquires about a particular characteristic of a credential.
Frees the memory associated with a buffer set descriptor and all the buffers it contains.
A pointer for accessing and manipulating data of a specific type.
